summary: Extra carryweight with stamina when levelling, and no delay for stamina regen.
descriptionHtml:
Instead of gaining 5 carryweight when you choose Stamina when you level up, this mod gives 100 carryweight every time you choose Stamina. Also, there is normally a 5 second delay after running out of stamina beforeÂ  stamina begins to regenerate - this mod removes that delay.
<br />
<br />*** DISCLAIMER - I made this for myself and decided to share. I will not alter this in any way to suit someone else. If you don't like it,
<br />don't subscribe; or better yet, make your own ***
author: MEMDurand
